alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Salt Lake Valley; Utah Valley; Wasatch Back; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80; Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs; Western Uinta Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 5:19PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Wasatch...eastern Salt Lake...eastern Davis...southwestern Morgan... southwestern Summit and northwestern Utah Counties through 600 PM MDT... At 519 PM MDT, mesonet observations reported strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Riverton to Springville. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. The Provo Airport reported a wind gust to 51 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Salt Lake City, West Valley City, Provo, Sandy, Murray, Park City, Heber City, West Jordan, Orem, Taylorsville, South Jordan, Lehi, Draper, Riverton, Spanish Fork, Pleasant Grove, Cottonwood Heights, Springville, Midvale and Holladay. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 255 and 304. Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 123 and 146. US Route 6 between mile markers 174 and 179. US Route 40 between mile markers 3 and 42. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
